detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, asymmetric skirt. Jersey lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Gently fitted jacket in a textured weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short, 5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with worn details, a button fly and sewn-in, raw-edge turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Lace top with short sleeves and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Partly lined in jersey.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in the side. Soft linings and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Short skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front. Unlined.
Polo-neck top in a soft, brushed viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, a V-neck with a wide flounced trim, long puff sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a tapered waist.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey.
Dungarees in washed stretch twill with adjustable straps and a pocket at the top. Side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Contrasting colour trims down the sleeves, and ribbed cuffs. Unlined.

Sporty, hooded jacket in nylon. High collar, a zip down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Seams front and back with a decorative D-ring at the front and diagonal, concealed front pockets with a zip. Elasticated drawstring around the hood and hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Jacket in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood and concealed two-way zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a yoke and cap sleeves in lace. V-neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Strapless bandeau bra in lace. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Loose yoke at the back with a concealed, ventilating mesh section, long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sports jacket in fleece with a hood and zip down the front.
Long-sleeved tunic in jersey crêpe with a rounded hem.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Jumper in a soft pattern knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut utility jacket in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, and large front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable tab and buttons at the back and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a decorative seam with glittery thread at the side.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 7 cm.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band decorated with plastic beads.
Shorts in airy linen. Regular drawstring waist with covered elastication, front pockets, fake back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Suit trousers in a checked weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit with triangle cups, removable inserts and ties at the top. Seam at the waist, a low-cut back and laser-cut scalloped trims.

Two-button jacket in stretch wool with narrow notch lapels, an open chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Adjustable metal chain waist belt with a carabiner hook at one end.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Boots in imitation patent leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, a zip in the side and lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Super skinny fit – a close-fitting, slightly shorter style with narrow sleeves and darts at the back creating a completely fitted silhouette.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sequined hood with a yoke and a grosgrain drawstring. Lined. The hood is made partly from recycled polyester.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Block-coloured jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide hairband in soft jersey. Width 7 cm.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Shopper in suede with two handles at the top, one with a decorative tassel. Size 14x28x30 cm.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length lace sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and sewn-in tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fitted vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey.

Straight-cut jacket in a soft silk and Tencel™ lyocell blend with wide notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Button and slit at the cuffs, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Sandals in imitation leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Hair elastics with metal decorations.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem. The cups are lined with fabric made from recycled polyester.
Short dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam under the bust, and a rounded hem.
Imitation leather sandals with butterfly appliqués at the front and a strap with a hook and loop fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and side pockets. Sewn-in turn-up at the cuffs and hems, and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Espadrilles in patterned cotton canvas with a sequined appliqué, elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sweatshirt in a printed cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a drawstring hood and small V-neck. Rounded, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and slanted side seams that create a gently tapered silhouette to the hem. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a smocked viscose weave with a frill-trimmed, square neckline and butterfly sleeves. Seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
